message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective. However, the product's value is considerably higher than your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,500. This reflects the product's worth and ensures a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $11,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the market price.
